remarks: The property of being a finitely supported function in the family ` S ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ dprdwd as of 11-Jul-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
dprdffOLD.w $e |- W = { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | ( `' h " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin } $.
dprdffOLD.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dprdffOLD.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dprdwdOLD.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> A e. ( S ` x ) ) $.
dprdwdOLD.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( `' ( x e. I |-> A ) " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
dprdwdOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. I |-> A ) e. W ) $.
$d .0. h $.
$d A h $.
$d G x $.
$d I h i x $.
$d S h i x $.
$d h x $.
$d ph x $.
